project_type: Health Tools and Daily Meal Website
core_concept: A website that provides simple health calculators and daily meal suggestions without medical diagnosis or treatment.

success_rules.example: Website focuses only on health calculators and daily meal suggestions.
User searches for 'How many calories do I need?' and gets an instant result.
BMI calculator returns a clear number and category (normal, overweight).

success_rules.rule: Each page provides result + explanation + advice
success_rules.example: BMI = 26, explanation of meaning, and general lifestyle tip.

success_rules.rule: Meal suggestions must be simple and realistic
success_rules.example: Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snack with common foods.
Page loads in under 3 seconds.
Buttons are large and readable on smartphones.
White background, readable font, no pop-ups.
About Us, Privacy Policy, Contact Us, Medical Disclaimer.

success_rules.rule: No medical diagnosis or medication advice
success_rules.example: Say 'Consult a doctor if symptoms persist' instead of naming drugs.
This website provides general information and does not replace professional medical advice.
Title: 'How much water should I drink per day?'
One page for calorie calculator, one page for meal plan.
Water calculator links to meal suggestion page.
One ad at top and one in middle of page.
Website has Privacy Policy and original content.
Add two new pages every week.
Rewrite unclear text and update meal plans.
Create new pages based on popular user queries.
Expect growth after 3 to 6 months.

content_guidelines.mandatory_notice: This website provides general health information and does not replace professional medical advice.

performance_targets.seo_focus: Long-tail health and daily life queries
